name: DJailbreak
description:
Use your DJ decks to control when penguins move, helping them avoid the frogs and get to the police vans.

Solo project completed for GMTK. All assets created by me, including the (crappy) music :D

------

Known bug - Sometimes the audio gets out of sync, I think it's if you spam the discs whilst they're changing tempo? Unfortunately never got a fix for this - sorry if it makes your ears cry!
